title: Chiefs-Broncos TNF Preview (Football 10/17)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Jared Dubin to preview Thursday's matchup between the Chiefs and Broncos. The guys break down Patrick Mahomes' injury status, a curious spread, Denver's improved defense and Kansas City's lack of one, before making their official pick and issuing over/unders on player props.
